remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 Get 方法 始终尝试转换值对象并将其作为字符串返回，否则返回一个字节数组。The Get method of always attempts to convert and return the value object as a string; otherwise it returns a byte array. 若要获得更好的性能，请在 知道属性值的返回类型时使用方法。To get a better performance, use the method if you know the return type of the attribute value.
